name: Dodgecube (metropolisgames)
description:
Dodge the Cubes in 3 Different Game Modes - Original, Snatch and our Personal Favorite, Downhill.

Original Mode Is a 2D Game Mode in which you, the Blue Sphere, must survive being chased by the Cubes. Every 10 seconds, the Cubes become faster, involving you to strategically out-maneuver them.

Snatch Mode is also 2D, and this time you must Snatch the Gold Ball. When you snatch it, it disappears to a new place. Just as in Original Mode, the Cubes become faster every 10 seconds, once again involving great strategics to beat your High Score.

Downhill Mode is, unlike its fellow game modes, 3D, and involves you going down a closed in hill, where multiple cubes are blocking the pathway. Can you get past them and claim victory?

Download Dodgecube to get 3 fun and entertaining game modes, each of which have 3 different difficulties, Easy, Medium and Hard. If you like the game, follow us on Instagram and Twitter @MetropolisGames for updates on content in the future!
